original_title: Tornadoes destroy entire town in Mississippi killing 26
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Several devastating tornadoes have swept through the U.S. state of Mississippi this weekend, destroying an entire town and killing at least 26 people, U.S. media reported.
Neighboring states of Alabama, Georgia and Louisiana are also facing storms and tornado watches.
